name: Mechanical Wonders
description:
Game Made for the Brackeys Jam of August 2020.

Mechanical Wonders is a short Rpg-Horror style game.

We follow the story of May Cannisse, a young aristocrat, on her way to visit her grandfather's manor, that she inherited. But her trip may prove to be quite a challenge.

Commands :

WASD/Arrow Keys to move.

SpaceBar to interact with things.

Left Shift to toggle a full view of the current room.

Credits :

Astride Couillaux/Dr Umbrus : Programming, Level Design, Sound design.

Madame Etrange : Graphisms and Music.
